# Magically Treated Sails
## Overview
**Magically Treated Sails**

The ship’s sails are enchanted for greater durability.

**Benefit:** The ship’s sails are magically treated, doubling their hit points and hardness. This improvement can only be added by a spellcaster with the [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]] feat.

**Requirements:** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] (sails) DC 15; Cost: 500 gp per 5-foot-square of sails

**Source:** Pirate Campaign Compendium (Legendary Games), pg. 97
